bioghist.p: The Elk Iron Works was a manufacturer of sheet iron, boiler plate, and nails in Elkton, Maryland. The works were owned by G. P. Whittaker & Co., and Whittaker, Garret & Co. The business was sold in 1867 to satisfy creditors.

scopecontent.p: This volume documents stock and merchandise accounts, customer accounts, and inventories of the Elk Iron Works from 1841-1844. Accounts were entered into the volume three times each month.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
